# Farm (Building)
## Overview
**Farm**

**Create** 53 Goods, 1 Influence, 50 Labor (2,090 gp)

**Rooms** 1 [[Animal Pen (Room)|Animal Pen]], 1 [[Bedroom (Room)|Bedroom]], 1 [[Farmland (Room)|Farmland]], 1 [[Garden (Room)|Garden]], 1 [[Kitchen (Room)|Kitchen]], 1 [[Lavatory (Room)|Lavatory]], 1 [[Sitting Room (Room)|Sitting Room]]

A small family farm or ranch.
